about_the_game:
HackOS – Dive into the Ultimate Hacking Sandbox

HackOS is the definitive hacking sandbox you've been waiting for. Immerse yourself in a world of virtual espionage, ethical dilemmas, and high-stakes strategy, all from the comfort of your terminal. Inspired by classic hacking games and refined for modern players, HackOS combines the depth of simulation with the excitement of arcade gameplay.

Key Features:

  • Authentic Hacking Experience: Utilize realistic commands, crack ports, infiltrate networks, and uncover secrets hidden in the shadows of the digital world.

  • Dynamic Sandbox: Explore an ever-evolving ecosystem influenced by your decisions. From the dark web marketplace to the global stock exchange, your actions shape the virtual landscape.

  • Story-Driven Campaign: Join factions, complete missions, and unravel the mysteries of Node Zero, a shadowy organization with its own agenda.

  • Advanced Modding Tools: Create your own missions, events, and scenarios with the intuitive HackOS Editor, inspired by node-based systems like Unreal's Blueprints.

  • Diverse Gameplay Systems: Manage your reputation, cooperate with factions, invest in the stock market, or trade cryptocurrencies. Every choice has consequences.

  • No Microtransactions, Ever: Enjoy the full game for a single, fair price.

Whether you’re a seasoned hacker or new to the genre, Hack OS offers an unparalleled hacking experience that will test your skills, your strategies, and your morality.

Are you ready to log in?
